languages.text: {n}Инфернус-мастер виновато улыбается вам.{/n} "Это я, конечно, загнул, простите. Нет никакого передового оснащения — слишком большие риски загубить его в огне. Справляемся человеческими ресурсами и самым очевидным: респираторами, огнеупорными робами, огнетушителями. Да и признаться, жизни инфернусов на этом корабле не в цене, куда важнее спасти оборудование и экипаж, а также минимизировать ущерб судну".

{n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."
languages.original_text: {n}Инфернус-мастер виновато улыбается вам.{/n} "Это я, конечно, загнул, простите. Нет никакого передового оснащения — слишком большие риски загубить его в огне. Справляемся человеческими ресурсами и самым очевидным: респираторами, огнеупорными робами, огнетушителями. Да и признаться, жизни инфернусов на этом корабле не в цене, куда важнее спасти оборудование и экипаж, а также минимизировать ущерб судну".

We manage with human resources and the most common things, respirators, fire extinguishers and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the Inferna are not worth much, it is more important to save the machines and minimize damage to the vessel."

We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. languages.text: {n}Le maître-infernus sourit d'un air coupable.{/n} « Désolé, c'était un peu un sarcasme. On a pas d'équipement de pointe ; autant vous dire qu'avec les incendies qu'on affronte, il ferait pas long feu. Sans mauvais jeu de mots. Non, on doit se débrouiller avec les ressources humaines à notre disposition, et notre équipement est on ne peut plus ordinaire : respirateurs, extincteurs et uniformes ignifuges. Parce que, soyons honnêtes, la vie des Infernus ne vaut pas grand-chose. Notre priorité, c'est de sauver les machines, et de minimiser les dégâts sur le vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître-infernus sourit d'un air coupable.{/n} « Désolé, c'était un peu un sarcasme. On a pas d'équipement de pointe ; autant vous dire qu'avec les incendies qu'on affronte, il ferait pas long feu. Sans mauvais jeu de mots. Non, on doit se débrouiller avec les ressources humaines à notre disposition, et notre équipement est on ne peut plus ordinaire : respirateurs, extincteurs et uniformes ignifuges. Parce que, soyons honnêtes, la vie des Infernus ne vaut pas grand-chose. Notre priorité, c'est de sauver les machines, et de minimiser les dégâts sur le vaisseau. »

languages.text: {n}El maestro de infernus sonríe con culpabilidad.{/n} «Perdón, he exagerado un poco. No tenemos nada de última tecnología; sería muy fácil arruinarlo con el fuego. Nos apañamos con recursos humanos y los objetos más corrientes: respiradores, extintores y uniformes ignífugos. La verdad es que las vidas de los infernus no valen mucho. Es más importante que salvemos las máquinas y limitemos los daños a la nave».
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro de infernus sonríe con culpabilidad.{/n} «Perdón, he exagerado un poco. No tenemos nada de última tecnología; sería muy fácil arruinarlo con el fuego. Nos apañamos con recursos humanos y los objetos más corrientes: respiradores, extintores y uniformes ignífugos. La verdad es que las vidas de los infernus no valen mucho. Es más importante que salvemos las máquinas y limitemos los daños a la nave».

languages.text: {n}控火大师愧疚地笑了起来。{/n}“这种说法其实有点夸张，我很抱歉。我们其实没有什么先进设备，毕竟我们天天和火场打交道，万一先进设备被烧坏了，那损失就大了。我们靠的只有人力，还有那些最常见的设备，像呼吸器、灭火器和阻燃制服之类的。实话实说，消防员的人命根本不值钱，那些机器比我们精贵多了。我们得保护好机器，尽可能减轻飞船受到的损失。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}控火大师愧疚地笑了起来。{/n}“这种说法其实有点夸张，我很抱歉。我们其实没有什么先进设备，毕竟我们天天和火场打交道，万一先进设备被烧坏了，那损失就大了。我们靠的只有人力，还有那些最常见的设备，像呼吸器、灭火器和阻燃制服之类的。实话实说，消防员的人命根本不值钱，那些机器比我们精贵多了。我们得保护好机器，尽可能减轻飞船受到的损失。”

languages.text: {n}インフェルヌスマスターは罪悪感のある笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「ちょっと無理がありましたね、すみません。最新の装備はありません。火の中で壊してしまう可能性があまりにも高い。人工呼吸器、消火器、難燃性のユニフォームなど、人的資源と最も一般的なものを使っている。インフェルヌスたちの命など、あまり価値がないでしょう。機械を救い、船のダメージを最小限に抑えることが優先です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."

traits.locale_text: {n}インフェルヌスマスターは罪悪感のある笑みを浮かべた。{/n} 「ちょっと無理がありましたね、すみません。最新の装備はありません。火の中で壊してしまう可能性があまりにも高い。人工呼吸器、消火器、難燃性のユニフォームなど、人的資源と最も一般的なものを使っている。インフェルヌスたちの命など、あまり価値がないでしょう。機械を救い、船のダメージを最小限に抑えることが優先です」

languages.text: {n}Der Infernus-Meister grinst schuldbewusst.{/n} "Das war ein wenig übertrieben, verzeiht. Es gibt keine hochmoderne Ausrüstung. Die Gefahr, dass sie im Feuer zerstört wird, ist zu groß. Wir müssen uns mit menschlichen Ressourcen und den noch am besten verfügbaren Dingen begnügen: Atemgeräte, Feuerlöscher und schwerentflammbare Uniformen. Sind wir doch mal ehrlich, die Leben der Inferni sind nicht viel wert. Es ist wichtiger, dass wir die Maschinen retten und den Schaden am Schiff minimieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."

Sind wir doch mal ehrlich, die Leben der Inferni sind nicht viel wert. Es ist wichtiger, dass wir die Maschinen retten und den Schaden am Schiff minimieren."

languages.text: {n}İtfa Üstadı mahcupça gülümsüyor.{/n} "Biraz abartmış olabilirim, üzgünüm. Teknolojinin son harikası ekipman falan yok, yangınlarda bu tip şeyleri heba etme riski çok fazla. İnsan kaynağımız ile solunum maskeleri, yangın söndürücüler ve aleve dayanıklı üniformalar gibi elimizin altındaki en yaygın gereçleri kullanarak idare ediyoruz. İtfacıların yaşamlarının pek değerli olmadığını kabul edelim. Makineleri kurtarmak ve gemiye gelecek hasarı minimize etmek daha önemli."
languages.original_text: {n}The Infernus Master smiles guiltily.{/n} "That was a bit of a stretch, I'm sorry. There is no state-of-the-art equipment; the risks of ruining it in a fire are too great. We get by using human resources and the most common items available: respirators, fire extinguishers, and flame-retardant uniforms. Let's face it, the lives of the inferni are not worth much. It's more important that we save the machines and minimise damage to the ship."
